notes.title: Recipe: One-pan lemon garlic pasta
notes.content:
Ingredients:
- spaghetti
- garlic
- lemon
- parmesan

Steps:
1. Simmer sauce.
2. Cook pasta *in* sauce.
3. Finish with cheese.

> Tip: Reserve a splash of starchy water.

notes.title: Ideas: Graph UI improvements
notes.content:
- Node clustering by tag
- Edge weighting by semantic similarity
- Export graph to SVG + JSON

**Question:** show similarity threshold in the UI as a badge?

notes.title: Study notes — Temporal GNN reading
notes.content:
Key points:
- Temporal message passing vs static graph embeddings
- Time encoding choices (sinusoidal, learnable)
- Evaluation leakage risks

TODO: write a small ablation plan.

notes.title: Personal finance — budget categories v2
notes.content:
Proposed categories:
- Needs (rent, groceries)
- Wants (eating out, hobbies)
- Savings (investing, emergency)

Edge cases:
- Transfers between accounts
- Refunds and chargebacks
